602820.name: Fantasy Grounds - P2 - The Dark City of the Queen of Spiders 4E Fantasy (Token Pack)
602820.description:
P2 - The Dark City of the Queen of Spiders

4E Fantasy Token Pack
This product contains all the tokens necessary for the 2nd paragon level 4E adventure.
This product is an installable module containing tokens for use with the Fantasy
Ground II virtual tabletop. Upon activating the module, the tokens will appear in
your Token box for use throughout your game. They have been organized by genre and
product name to make it easy to use multiple token pack modules within your game.
Tokens are scaled and organized in the following sizes for medium creatures: 32x32,
50x50, 75x75 and 100x100 pixels. This allows you to use the token quality that best
meets your needs.
This pack contains tokens for the following characters:
  • demon goristro (huge)
  • demon immolith (large)
  • demon mezzodemon (large)
  • demon vrock (large)
  • draegloth (large)
  • dragonborn raider (medium)
  • dragonspawn blackspawn gloomweb (large)
  • dragonspawn deepspawn nightmare (medium)
  • drider shadowspinner (large)
  • drow arachnomancer (medium)
  • drow assassin (medium)
  • drow blademaster (medium)
  • drow demonbinder (medium)
  • drow inquisitor (medium)
  • drow matron (medium)
  • drow necromancer (medium)
  • drow priest (medium)
  • drow sniper (medium)
  • drow spiderguard (medium)
  • drow templar (medium)
  • drow vampire (medium)
  • drow vampire spawn (medium)
  • drow warlord (medium)
  • eidolon venomscorched (large)
  • flameskull demonic (tiny)
  • ghost wailing (medium)
  • ghoul abyssal hungerer (medium)
  • ghoul abyssal (medium)
  • ghoul cleric (medium)

  • goblin slave (small)
  • golem web (large)

  • minotaur savage (large)

  • rakshasa noble (medium)

  • spider brutal swarm (large)

  • umber hulk (large)
  • vampire spawn bloodhunter (medium)

Fantasy Grounds II Conversion: Doug Davison
Ruleset Compatibility: Any
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Doug Davison
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
